name: The End is Missing
description:
Submission to the Godot WildJam #31.

Theme: Something is missing.
Wildcard used: Duck, Duck, Moose

This is a simple and minimalist space shooter. Move, shoot, avoid bullet... and that's all =)

Controls:

  • WASD or Arrow keys to move.
  • Mouse: aim.
  • Left click: shoot.
  • Right click hold and release: active or desactivate shield.

As it was my first Godot project, there may have tons of bugs, feel free to report them, or just leave a comment if you liked the concept.

Also, have no shame using the infinite life helper as the difficulty is kind of random.

Credits:
made it all except for the Voice Generator which was created by TNTC-LAB
https://tntc-lab.itch.io/godot-voice-generator
